verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֞ע <WH8085> heard הַכְּנַעֲנִ֤י <WH3669> the Canaanite מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And [when] king עֲרָד֙ <WH6166> Arad יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> which dwelt הַנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> in the south כִּ֚י <WH3588> for בָּ֣א <WH935> came יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> tell that Israel דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way הָאֲתָרִ֑ים <WH871> of the spies וַיִּלָּ֙חֶם֙ <WH3898> then he fought בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> against Israel וַיִּ֥שְׁבְּ ׀ <WH7617> and took מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> some שֶֽׁבִי׃ <WH7628> [some] of them prisoners

וַיִּדַּ֨ר <WH5087> vowed יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> And Israel נֶ֛דֶר <WH5088> a vow לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said אִם־ <WH518> If נָתֹ֨ן <WH5414> If thou wilt indeed תִּתֵּ֜ן <WH5414> deliver אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this בְּיָדִ֔י <WH3027> into my hand וְהַֽחֲרַמְתִּ֖י <WH2763> then I will utterly destroy אֶת־ <WH853> עָרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5892> their cities

וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <WH8085> hearkened יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> to the voice יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> and delivered up אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> the Canaanites וַיַּחֲרֵ֥ם <WH2763> and they utterly destroyed אֶתְהֶ֖ם <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> עָרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5892> them and their cities וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and he called שֵׁם־ <WH8034> the name הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> of the place חָרְמָֽה׃ <WH2767> Hormah פ

וַיִּסְע֞וּ <WH5265> And they journeyed מֵהֹ֤ר <WH2023> Hor הָהָר֙ <WH2022> from mount דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way יַם־ <WH3220> sea ס֔וּף <WH5488> of the Red לִסְבֹ֖ב <WH5437> to compass אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land אֱד֑וֹם <WH123> of Edom וַתִּקְצַ֥ר <WH7114> was much discouraged נֶֽפֶשׁ־ <WH5315> and the soul הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> because of the way

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> And the people בֵּֽאלֹהִים֮ <WH430> against God וּבְמֹשֶׁה֒ <WH4872> and against Moses לָמָ֤ה <WH4100> Why הֶֽעֱלִיתֻ֙נוּ֙ <WH5927> Wherefore have ye brought us up מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt לָמ֖וּת <WH4191> to die בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> desert כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֥ין <WH369> is no לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> bread וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and no מַ֔יִם <WH4325> neither [is there any] water וְנַפְשֵׁ֣נוּ <WH5315> and our soul קָ֔צָה <WH6973> loatheth בַּלֶּ֖חֶם <WH3899> food הַקְּלֹקֵֽל׃ <WH7052> this light

וַיְשַׁלַּ֨ח <WH7971> sent יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD בָּעָ֗ם <WH5971> among the people אֵ֚ת <WH853> הַנְּחָשִׁ֣ים <WH5175> serpents הַשְּׂרָפִ֔ים <WH8314> fiery וַֽיְנַשְּׁכ֖וּ <WH5391> and they bit אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> the people וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> died עַם־ <WH5971> people רָ֖ב <WH7227> and much מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיָּבֹא֩ <WH935> came הָעָ֨ם <WH5971> Therefore the people אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> to Moses וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and said חָטָ֗אנוּ <WH2398> We have sinned כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because דִבַּ֤רְנוּ <WH1696> for we have spoken בַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> against the LORD וָבָ֔ךְ הִתְפַּלֵּל֙ <WH6419> and against thee pray אֶל־ <WH413> with יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְיָסֵ֥ר <WH5493> that he take away מֵעָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> הַנָּחָ֑שׁ <WH5175> the serpents וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <WH6419> prayed מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> from us And Moses בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> for הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> for the people

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses עֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH6213> Make לְךָ֙ שָׂרָ֔ף <WH8314> thee a fiery serpent וְשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> and set אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> on נֵ֑ס <WH5251> it upon a pole וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> shall come כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone הַנָּשׁ֔וּךְ <WH5391> and it shall come to pass that every one that is bitten וְרָאָ֥ה <WH7200> when he looketh אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> וָחָֽי׃ <WH2425> upon it shall live

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> made מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses נְחַ֣שׁ <WH5175> a serpent נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass וַיְשִׂמֵ֖הוּ <WH7760> and put עַל־ <WH5921> on הַנֵּ֑ס <WH5251> it upon a pole וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> came אִם־ <WH518> if נָשַׁ֤ךְ <WH5391> had bitten הַנָּחָשׁ֙ <WH5175> and it came to pass that if a serpent אֶת־ <WH853> אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> any man וְהִבִּ֛יט <WH5027> when he beheld אֶל־ <WH413> about נְחַ֥שׁ <WH5175> the serpent הַנְּחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass וָחָֽי׃ <WH2425> he lived
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> set forward בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּאֹבֹֽת׃ <WH88> in Oboth

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they journeyed מֵאֹבֹ֑ת <WH88> from Oboth וַֽיַּחֲנ֞וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּעִיֵּ֣י הָֽעֲבָרִ֗ים <WH5863> at Ijeabarim בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> in the wilderness אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> which [is] before מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> Moab מִמִּזְרַ֖ח <WH4217> east side הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> east side
מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there נָסָ֑עוּ <WH5265> From thence they removed וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּנַ֥חַל <WH5158> in the valley זָֽרֶד׃ <WH2218> of Zared

מִשָּׁם֮ <WH8033> there נָסָעוּ֒ <WH5265> From thence they removed וַֽיַּחֲנ֗וּ <WH2583> and pitched מֵעֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> on the other side אַרְנוֹן֙ <WH769> of Arnon אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> which [is] in the wilderness הַיֹּצֵ֖א <WH3318> that cometh out מִגְּב֣וּל <WH1366> of the coasts הָֽאֱמֹרִ֑י <WH567> of the Amorites כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אַרְנוֹן֙ <WH769> for Arnon גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> [is] the border מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> between Moab וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <WH567> and the Amorites

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> it יֵֽאָמַ֔ר <WH559> Wherefore it is said בְּסֵ֖פֶר <WH5612> in the book מִלְחֲמֹ֣ת <WH4421> of the wars יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> וָהֵ֣ב <WH2052> What he did בְּסוּפָ֔ה <WH5492> in the Red sea וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּחָלִ֖ים <WH5158> and in the brooks אַרְנֽוֹן׃ <WH769> of Arnon

וְאֶ֙שֶׁד֙ <WH793> And at the stream הַנְּחָלִ֔ים <WH5158> of the brooks אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that נָטָ֖ה <WH5186> that goeth down לְשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> to the dwelling עָ֑ר <WH6144> of Ar וְנִשְׁעַ֖ן <WH8172> and lieth לִגְב֥וּל <WH1366> upon the border מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> of Moab

וּמִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there בְּאֵ֑רָה <WH876> And from thence [they went] to Beer הִ֣וא <WH1931> that הַבְּאֵ֗ר <WH875> that [is] the well אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> where אָמַ֤ר <WH559> spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> whereof the LORD לְמֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses אֱסֹף֙ <WH622> together אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> and I will give לָהֶ֖ם מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> them water ס

אָ֚ז <WH227> Then יָשִׁ֣יר <WH7891> sang יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Then Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַשִּׁירָ֖ה <WH7892> this song הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise עֲלִ֥י <WH5927> Spring up בְאֵ֖ר <WH875> O well עֱנוּ־ <WH6030> sing לָֽהּ׃

בְּאֵ֞ר <WH875> the well חֲפָר֣וּהָ <WH2658> digged שָׂרִ֗ים <WH8269> The princes כָּר֙וּהָ֙ <WH3738> digged נְדִיבֵ֣י <WH5081> the nobles הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people בִּמְחֹקֵ֖ק <WH2710> it by [the direction of] the lawgiver בְּמִשְׁעֲנֹתָ֑ם <WH4938> with their staves וּמִמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> And from the wilderness מַתָּנָֽה׃ <WH4980> [they went] to Mattanah
וּמִמַּתָּנָ֖ה <WH4980> And from Mattanah נַחֲלִיאֵ֑ל <WH5160> to Nahaliel וּמִנַּחֲלִיאֵ֖ל <WH5160> and from Nahaliel בָּמֽוֹת׃ <WH1120> to Bamoth

וּמִבָּמ֗וֹת <WH1120> And from Bamoth הַגַּיְא֙ <WH1516> [in] the valley אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> is in בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> that [is] in the country מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> to the top הַפִּסְגָּ֑ה <WH6449> of Pisgah וְנִשְׁקָ֖פָה <WH8259> which looketh עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> toward הַיְשִׁימֹֽן׃ <WH3452> Jeshimon פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> And Israel מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to סִיחֹ֥ן <WH5511> unto Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> of the Amorites לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אֶעְבְּרָ֣ה <WH5674> Let me pass בְאַרְצֶ֗ךָ <WH776> through thy land לֹ֤א <WH3808> We will not נִטֶּה֙ <WH5186> we will not turn בְּשָׂדֶ֣ה <WH7704> into the fields וּבְכֶ֔רֶם <WH3754> or into the vineyards לֹ֥א <WH3808> we will not נִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <WH8354> we will not drink מֵ֣י <WH4325> [of] the waters בְאֵ֑ר <WH875> of the well בְּדֶ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> [high] way הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> by the king's נֵלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> will go עַ֥ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> after נַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> until we be past גְּבֻלֶֽךָ׃ <WH1366> thy borders

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> would not suffer סִיחֹ֣ן <WH5511> And Sihon אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> Israel עֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> to pass בִּגְבֻלוֹ֒ <WH1366> through his border וַיֶּאֱסֹ֨ף <WH622> together סִיחֹ֜ן <WH5511> but Sihon אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַמּ֗וֹ <WH5971> all his people וַיֵּצֵ֞א <WH3318> and went out לִקְרַ֤את <WH7125> against יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel הַמִּדְבָּ֔רָה <WH4057> into the wilderness וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and he came יָ֑הְצָה <WH3096> to Jahaz וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <WH3898> and fought בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> against Israel

וַיַּכֵּ֥הוּ <WH5221> smote יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> And Israel לְפִי־ <WH6310> him with the edge חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> of the sword וַיִּירַ֨שׁ <WH3423> and possessed אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצ֜וֹ <WH776> his land מֵֽאַרְנֹ֗ן <WH769> from Arnon עַד־ <WH5704> far יַבֹּק֙ <WH2999> unto Jabbok עַד־ <WH5704> far בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> even unto the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עַ֔ז <WH5794> [was] strong גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> for the border בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> took יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> And Israel אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הֶעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> all these cities הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> dwelt יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> and Israel בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> in all the cities הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites בְּחֶשְׁבּ֖וֹן <WH2809> in Heshbon וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1323> and in all the villages

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For חֶשְׁבּ֔וֹן <WH2809> For Heshbon עִ֗יר <WH5892> [was] the city סִיחֹ֛ן <WH5511> of Sihon מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> of the Amorites הִ֑וא <WH1931> who וְה֣וּא <WH1931> who נִלְחַ֗ם <WH3898> who had fought בְּמֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> king מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> of Moab הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> against the former וַיִּקַּ֧ח <WH3947> and taken אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אַרְצ֛וֹ <WH776> all his land מִיָּד֖וֹ <WH3027> out of his hand עַד־ <WH5704> far אַרְנֹֽן׃ <WH769> even unto Arnon

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that יֹאמְר֥וּ <WH559> say הַמֹּשְׁלִ֖ים <WH4911> Wherefore they that speak in proverbs בֹּ֣אוּ <WH935> Come חֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <WH2809> into Heshbon תִּבָּנֶ֥ה <WH1129> be built וְתִכּוֹנֵ֖ן <WH3559> and prepared עִ֥יר <WH5892> let the city סִיחֽוֹן׃ <WH5511> of Sihon

כִּי־ <WH3588> For אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> For there is a fire יָֽצְאָ֣ה <WH3318> gone out מֵֽחֶשְׁבּ֔וֹן <WH2809> of Heshbon לֶהָבָ֖ה <WH3852> a flame מִקִּרְיַ֣ת <WH7151> from the city סִיחֹ֑ן <WH5511> of Sihon אָֽכְלָה֙ <WH398> it hath consumed עָ֣ר <WH6144> Ar מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab בַּעֲלֵ֖י <WH1167> the dominant בָּמ֥וֹת <WH1116> height אַרְנֹֽן׃ <WH769> of Arnon

אוֹי־ <WH188> Woe לְךָ֣ מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> to thee Moab אָבַ֖דְתָּ <WH6> thou art undone עַם־ <WH5971> O people כְּמ֑וֹשׁ <WH3645> of Chemosh נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> he hath given בָּנָ֤יו <WH1121> his sons פְּלֵיטִם֙ <WH6412> that escaped וּבְנֹתָ֣יו <WH1323> and his daughters בַּשְּׁבִ֔ית <WH7628> captive לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> of the Amorites סִיחֽוֹן׃ <WH5511> unto Sihon

וַנִּירָ֛ם <WH3384> We have shot אָבַ֥ד <WH6> is perished חֶשְׁבּ֖וֹן <WH2809> at them Heshbon עַד־ <WH5704> far דִּיב֑וֹן <WH1769> even unto Dibon וַנַּשִּׁ֣ים <WH8074> and we have laid them waste עַד־ <WH5704> even נֹ֔פַח <WH5302> even unto Nophah אֲשֶׁ֖רׅ <WH834> Which עַד־ <WH5704> even מֵֽידְבָֽא׃ <WH4311> which [reacheth] unto Medeba
וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH3427> dwelt יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Thus Israel בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <WH567> of the Amorites

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses לְרַגֵּ֣ל <WH7270> to spy out אֶת־ <WH853> יַעְזֵ֔ר <WH3270> Jaazer וַֽיִּלְכְּד֖וּ <WH3920> and they took בְּנֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH1323> the villages [וַיִּירֶשׁ כ] (וַיֹּ֖ורֶשׁ <WH3423> cast out ק) אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֱמֹרִ֥י <WH567> the Amorites אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיִּפְנוּ֙ <WH6437> And they turned וַֽיַּעֲל֔וּ <WH5927> and went up דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <WH1316> of Bashan וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> went out עוֹג֩ <WH5747> and Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king הַבָּשָׁ֨ן <WH1316> of Bashan לִקְרָאתָ֜ם <WH7125> against ה֧וּא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> all עַמּ֛וֹ <WH5971> them he and all his people לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to the battle אֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <WH154> at Edrei

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> unto Moses אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֣א <WH3372> Fear אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> כִּ֣י <WH3588> into בְיָדְךָ֞ <WH3027> him into thy hand נָתַ֧תִּי <WH5414> him not for I have delivered אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> and all his people וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> and his land וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> and thou shalt do לּ֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עָשִׂ֗יתָ <WH6213> to him as thou didst לְסִיחֹן֙ <WH5511> unto Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> which dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּֽוֹן׃ <WH2809> at Heshbon
